channel.title: Flags on Floyd
channel.description: Recent content in Flags on Floyd

item.title: Fascinating Flags
item.description:
• https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Greece - Fascinating because of the supposed connection with the phrase “Ελευθερία ή Θάνατος”
  • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Bikini_Atoll - Fascinating historical significance behind this flag
  • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Bangladesh - Fascinating because the central circle is off-centered so that it appears in the middle when flying from a pole/mast
  • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tehuelche_people#/media/File:Bandiera_tehuelche.jpg - This one is just oddly laid out. I like it as it is very unusual and eye-catching.
